text: Mata fushinjin-sha-tachi ga, anata (muhanmado) ni taishi ikaga ni sakubō shita ka o omoiokoshi nasai. Anata o kōkin shi, aruiwa satsugai shi, aruiwa mata hōchiku shiyou to shita. Kare-ra wa sakubō shitaga, arrā mo mata keiryaku o megurase rareta. Hontōni arrā wa mottomo sugureta keiryaku-sha de ara reru
